title: One killed in crash on I-95 in Prince William; southbound lanes closed
text:
One person was killed in a crash involving a motorcycle Sunday night on Interstate 95 in Prince William County, authorities said. All southbound lanes were closed after the incident.

The crash occurred about 7:30 p.m. near mile marker 160 and Route 123, Virginia State Police said.

The southbound lanes remained closed about two hours later.

The Virginia Department of Transportation said traffic would be diverted off the interstate at Route 123.

Cars south of the interchange would be turned around and sent back, VDOT said.

description: The incident involved a motorcycle, state police said.
